statements: SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM student_info WHERE age > 20;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE course_enrollment = 'Mathematics';
SELECT id, email FROM student_info WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT name, course_enrollment FROM student_info WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM student_info WHERE course_enrollment LIKE '%Math%' AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age ASC, name ASC;
SELECT name, age, course_enrollment FROM student_info WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT DISTINCT course_enrollment FROM student_info ORDER BY course_enrollment ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, age, email FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_id, name, course_enrollment FROM Students WHERE course_enrollment = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, age, email, course_enrollment FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.course_enrollment = Courses.course_name;
SELECT name, email, course_enrollment FROM Students WHERE course_enrollment = 'Math';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, age, email FROM Students WHERE age < 25 AND course_enrollment LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT name, age, email FROM students WHERE course_enrollment = 'Math';
SELECT id, name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE course_enrollment = 'Math' AND age < 25
SELECT s.name, c.course_name, e.enrollment_date FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.instructor = 'John Doe'
SELECT s.name, s.age, c.course_name, c.instructor FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE s.age BETWEEN 18 AND 22
SELECT s.name, c.course_name, e.enrollment_date FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.credits > 3 ORDER BY s.name
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, age FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM Enrollments;
SELECT student_id, count(course_id) as course_count FROM Enrollments GROUP BY student_id HAVING course_count > 1;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Grades.grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id JOIN Grades ON Enrollments.enrollment_id = Grades.enrollment_id;
SELECT name, age, email FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_id, name, course_id FROM Students ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC;

SELECT s.name AS student_name, c.course_name AS course, g.grade FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id JOIN Grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id WHERE g.grade >= 80;

SELECT s.name AS student_name, c.course_name AS course, e.enrollment_date FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY e.enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT c.course_name AS course, COUNT(e.enrollment_id) AS total_enrollments FROM Courses c LEFT JOIN Enrollments e ON c.course_id = e.course_id GROUP BY c.course_name HAVING COUNT(e.enrollment_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age, email FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM teachers WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE course_enrollment = 'Mathematics'
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_code LIKE 'ENG%'
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT s.name AS student_name, c.course_name AS course_name FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_enrollment = c.course_code
